    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractLifecycle
    Abstract base class providing lifecycle management for Neon components.
    AckStateMachine
    Centralized state machine for managing acknowledgments in reliable packet delivery.
    AckStateMachine.PacketState
    State of a tracked packet.
    AckStateMachine.PendingPacket
    Information about a packet awaiting acknowledgment.
    AckStateMachine.ProcessResult
    Result of processing pending packets.
    Backpressure
    Backpressure signaling for flow control between Neon components.
    Backpressure.Listener
    Listener for backpressure signals.
    Backpressure.Signal
    Backpressure signal indicating current pressure state.
    Backpressure.State
    Snapshot of backpressure state at a point in time.
    BatchAckManager
    Manages batched ACK processing to reduce packet overhead.
    ByteBufferPool
    Thread-safe object pool for byte arrays to reduce GC pressure.
    ConnectionTimeoutException
    Exception thrown when a connection times out, such as when a client fails to acknowledge packets or respond to ping messages.
    EventDrivenReceiver
    Event-driven packet receiver using NIO Selector.
    GamePacketDescriptor
    Descriptor for a registered game packet type, providing metadata about packet structure, versioning, and validation rules.
    GamePacketDescriptor.Builder
    Builder for creating GamePacketDescriptor instances.
    GamePacketRegistry
    Registry for game packet types with subtype, version, and validation support.
    Lifecycle
    Defines the lifecycle states and transitions for Neon components.
    Lifecycle.State
    Lifecycle states for Neon components.
    Lifecycle.StateChangeListener
    Listener for lifecycle state changes.
    LoggerConfig
    Utility class to configure loggers with custom formatting.
    NeonClient
    Neon protocol client implementation.
    NeonClient.TriConsumer<A,B,C>
    Functional interface for callbacks with three parameters.
    NeonClientJNI
    JNI wrapper for NeonClient to enable C/C++ integration.
    NeonConfig
    Configuration class for Project Neon networking parameters.
    NeonConfig.Builder
    Builder class for creating NeonConfig instances with a fluent API.
    NeonException
    Base exception class for all Project Neon exceptions.
    NeonHost
    Neon protocol host implementation.
    NeonHost.TriConsumer<A,B,C>
    Functional interface for callbacks with three parameters.
    NeonHostJNI
    JNI wrapper for NeonHost to enable C/C++ integration.
    NeonLogFormatter
    Custom log formatter for Project Neon that formats log messages as: [HH-MM-ss LEVEL]: Message
    NeonMetrics
    Core metrics collection for Project Neon networking.
    NeonMetrics.Snapshot
    Immutable snapshot of metrics at a point in time.
    NeonPacket
    Complete Neon packet with header and payload.
    NeonRelay
    Neon protocol relay server.
    NeonSocket
    UDP socket wrapper for Neon protocol operations.
    NeonSocket.ReceivedNeonPacket
    Helper record for received Neon packets.
    NeonSocket.ReceivedPacket
    Helper record for received raw packets.
    PacketHeader
    Fixed 8-byte packet header for all Neon packets.
    PacketPayload
    Base interface for all packet payloads.
    PacketPayload.Ack
     
    PacketPayload.ConnectAccept
     
    PacketPayload.ConnectDeny
     
    PacketPayload.ConnectRequest
     
    PacketPayload.DisconnectNotice
     
    PacketPayload.GamePacket
     
    PacketPayload.PacketTypeEntry
     
    PacketPayload.PacketTypeRegistry
     
    PacketPayload.Ping
     
    PacketPayload.Pong
     
    PacketPayload.ReconnectRequest
     
    PacketPayload.SessionConfig
     
    PacketType
    Core packet types for the Neon protocol.
    PacketValidationException
    Exception thrown when packet validation fails due to invalid data, malformed packets, or protocol violations.
    PayloadDeserializer<T>
    Functional interface for deserializing packet payloads from bytes.
    PayloadRegistry
    Registry for packet payload deserializers.
    PayloadSizeEnforcer
    Enforces payload size constraints for packet validation.
    PayloadSizeEnforcer.PayloadSizeException
    Exception thrown in strict mode when payload size validation fails.
    PayloadSizeEnforcer.Result
    Result of payload size enforcement.
    PerformanceMetrics
    Tracks performance metrics for Neon protocol operations.
    PerformanceMetrics.LatencyStats
     
    PublicAPI
    Indicates that a class, interface, method, or field is part of the public API and is guaranteed to remain stable across minor version updates.
    RelaySemantics
    Defines the honest relay semantics for packet forwarding.
    RelaySemantics.PeerLookup
    Interface for looking up peer information in sessions.
    RelaySemantics.RoutingDecision
    Result of a routing decision.
    RelaySemantics.RoutingDecision.Broadcast
    Packet should be broadcast to multiple destinations.
    RelaySemantics.RoutingDecision.RelayHandled
    Packet is a control packet handled by the relay itself.
    RelaySemantics.RoutingDecision.Unicast
    Packet should be forwarded to a single destination.
    RelaySemantics.RoutingDecision.Unroutable
    Packet cannot be routed - destination not found.
    ReliablePacketManager
    Optional reliability layer for game packets.
    RuntimeConfig
    Runtime configuration system with hot-reload support.
    RuntimeConfig.ConfigChangeListener
    Listener interface for configuration changes.
    SessionNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when a session cannot be found in the relay, typically when routing packets to non-existent sessions.
    SessionState
    Serializable session state for persistence and recovery.
    SessionState.Builder
    Builder for session state.
    SessionState.ClientState
    State of a single client in the session.
    StructuredLogger
    Structured logging with JSON output for Neon components.
    Transport
    Abstract transport layer for Neon protocol communication.
    Transport.ReceivedData
    Container for received data with source address.
    Transport.Type
    Transport types supported by the protocol.
    UdpTransport
    UDP implementation of the Transport interface.
    VersionMismatchHandler
    Handles protocol version mismatches between peers.
    VersionMismatchHandler.ActionType
    Types of suggested actions for version mismatches.
    VersionMismatchHandler.Result
    Result of a version check.
    VersionMismatchHandler.SuggestedAction
    Suggested action when a version mismatch is detected.
    VersionMismatchHandler.VersionMismatchException
    Exception thrown when version validation fails.
    VirtualThreads
    Utility for creating virtual threads (Java 21+) with graceful fallback to platform threads.
